definition: to speak out for justice (idiom); to take a stand on a matter of principle
weaponry/to hold (a weapon)/to wield/to rely on/to depend on/war/battle
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: So, dear young people, please speak up for peace.
sentences.chinese: 所以，親愛的青年朋友，請爲和平仗義執言。

sentences.english: Only this sturdy person dared speak boldly to uphold justice, may be able to affect people.
sentences.chinese: 只有這位堅強的人敢仗義執言，也許能感動人民。

sentences.english: You need also to be clear of your own motives in speaking to your friend.
sentences.chinese: 同時你還要弄清自己仗義執言的動機。
